{Scorpina}

    During the old beast wars many stasis pods crashed to earth=
 but were never recovered by maximal or predicon. One such pod landed in th=
e desert valleys that would one day become Egypt. The sleek black pod crash=
ing through the shallow baby that was the river nile embedding itself in a =
tall dune of sand and dirt.

    There covered by the dunes the stasis pod =
itself went into a form of stasis lock, perserving the transformer protofor=
m inside until the neo beast wars began. The winds having shifted the sands=
 and dirt from the scarred pod the scanner erupted from the re activating p=
od sending out its usual beacon though its range fairly limited so only the=
 Alliance base might pick it up, but the life form scan was under way even =
then, the protoform changing as it adapted to the harsh desert....
